caption: Better than any of the other restaurants around here and the food is actually amazing. Some of the best pizzas I’ve ever had.
Unique pizza! The crust is incredible - very different, sorta like a cracker.... it's very good. Fresh ingredients and quality service.
So good been going for years
Delicious. I highly recommend !
Great place to grab a football (soccer) match, buy some dough (to make your pizza at home if you want) or a fresh pie there, grab some strong frozen drinks outside. Very very friendly

Delicious pizza! I mean, to each their own, but this is JUST how I like it! Beautiful fresh-tasting sauce and cheese woth a crispy crust. Yes please, three meals a day ;) one question - do you use organic ingredients?? Would love to know...
The BEST pizza in Brooklyn!!!!! The owner was amazing and so welcoming!!!!
I found it to be the most disgusting pizza I’ve ever eaten, a delivery of $27.00 for a medium pie and it was called a large.  Horrible😡
Can't express how much a great time I had here along with the incredible food. Came for champions league game and the service was amazing. I highly recommend coming here
Amazing food, fantastic service. Great place to watch soccer!
Best value in the neighborhood, and they even deliver two miles away! Thin crust and tasty. If you take the large one, the next day, put it the oven and it still perfect! Thank you, great job always!
Like this pizza

Said it was delivered and picked up by my roommate, but no one ever got it. Instructions specifically said ring door. Delivery guy can’t read English? Made me wait 2 hours, called them after 90 min and they said he was on the way. Called after 120 min and they said it was delivered, I’m like..... uh no. They didn’t try to compensate or anything. Literally waited by my door, 2 hours.
Warm, friendly, "Nice" attitude, great pizza..
Surely a spot worth stopping over, the food is awesome and well prepared, the costs are affordable and it is always well kept there. Highly recommended.
Best Pizza in the Neighborhood. It’s Thin crust so indulge

The best super thin crust in Brooklyn. Perfect paper thin pepperoni, addictive caramelized onions, delicious little dollops of pesto. The first time I tried this, I ordered it again the next day it was so addictive. Never moving out of delivery range of this spot!

Sauce and toppings were good but the crust was like cardboard. Way too thin and wayyyyy too flaky (burnt flaky). It was not fulfilling at all for the price they ask for. I am very skeptical about trying anything else at the restaurant.
The sauce is good, toppings are good, but the crust is horrible. It’s sooo thin that it crumbles as you touch it. It is hollowed out...Chucky Cheese pizza is wayyy better.
This pizza is very nice! Super good. Very crunchy crust if you are into that sort of thing.
Best Pizza in the Neighborhood. It’s Thin crust so indulge
Overpriced small thin pizza

the thin crust is ridiculous. tasteless and breaks into bits when you pick it up. otherwise the toppings were almost non existent. i honestly think its the worst pizza i have ever eaten. i dont have any idea how they stay in business.
This pizza parlor is trash. I will never buy from them again. Why does my pizza look like it got mold?
Great pizza.

The nastiest place ever, I ordered a pizza from here, the pizza came with literally 10 hairs on it, the food smelled like a dead rat, called in about the guy barley spoke English and had attitude the whole time, don’t waste ur money going to a place like this.
nasty
Do not lose your money for bad food !! Its nasty food

I’ve ordered from this place 3 times and I think it’s fantastic. The crust is super crispy, seems very fresh, and there’s veggie options. Also, it doesn’t make you feel terrible after devouring like most places do.
Personal pizza and drink is clutch. No regrets.
Rude delivery person, low quality ingredients, inedible.
Cozy and variety of Pizzas to choose from.

We had the same experience as a prior review, we asked for a margarita pizza, it was a cheese pizza.  And this was after 40min of waiting.  The waitress when I asked about why 2 personal pizzas were taking so long, she stated that if I didn’t want to wait I could go.  They know that 40min of waiting and ones hungry the client doesn’t have other choice than shut up and wait.  Btw there were 3 other clients and us, so it wasn’t an issue of the kitchen been busy
The best 🍕, if you love 🍕, not NY pizza

I discovered this place a couple years back around my church and the first time I went there it was amazing just like the other night it's not too expensive has awesome music and decor and if you need it's the best spot for a budding Romance

OK pizza. The restaurant doesn't take credit card but they have an ATM that doesn't work. The pizza maker was extremely rude and basically ignored us. We were the only people in the restaurant. Won't go back for a while.
I like
Very good food, atmosphere, polite owner. Got the French Onion soup, salad, and pizza.

This is the second time we give this place a chance after one of the cooks flirted my wife. 2 pizzas took more than 40m. When I asked why it was taking too long his answer was "I know, but the kitchen is busy" there was 5 people total in the restaurant, he got quite defensive. Didn't check on us a single time, had to ask for the check twice. Not going there again. Won't recommend.
Best thin crust pizza. Try the oriental
Not really a knock on them, just disappointing that there was no warning they'd shut down for renovations.
(Translated by Google) Delicious pizzas, quick service!  (Original) Pizzas délicieuses, service rapide !
Great pizza . good ppl.   Friendly service
0% crust. Hollow job
Nice
Unique and delicious pizza, will definitely eat here again.
Bedstuy best pizza!
Best and apparently most underrated pizza in BK.
Hands down best pie in bed stuy. It's "fancy pizza", great thin crust and super high quality ingredients. I am legitimately addicted to their caramelized onions.

God forbid you try to order anything for delivery off Seamless. They will take over an hour just to get the food prepared (not even out for delivery yet). Absolutely unapologetic and unprofessional management going on there! STAY AWAY!
Always delicious
Don't like the pizzas : too thin, no flavor and very expensive !!!! Owner with an attitude. I don't like the way he behaves in front of the customers.
No Matter How You Slice It, It's Good!
Great thin crust
Great pizza.

(Translated by Google) Very delicious, ordered in the evening 6 pizzas within 45 minutes everything was delivered. Everything was really delicious, had a variety of pizzas, were all great 😁  (Original) Sehr sehr lecker, haben abends 6 Pizzen bestellt innerhalb 45 Minuten wurde alles geliefert. War alles wirklich super lecker, haben eine Auswahl an Pizzen gehabt, waren alle super 😁
The best salad 🥗 😋😋😋

I'm not going to give this a bad critique so to speak that's just the pizza is way too thin but I understand why they do that because they don't want you to have a lot of dough cuz a lot of bread from pizza is fattening but the pizza is okay and itself that comes with cheese and oregano but you have to pay a dollar fifty for the other stuff that's the part I don't like other than that the delivery guy needs a raise cuz he does a good job and he's friendly and polite.
A cozy place with good food and fair prices. I stopped by with my wife, just looking for some random place to eat and we got there. We really enjoy and we got back in the other day.
One of the not so good pizzas I’ve ever had in the city. Really hard crust, lack of flavor, arrived to my house cold and late. Not a fan.
My first slice of pizza I ever had in NYC. INCREDIBLE. I ended up grabbing two extra slices. 3 all together lol BLESSSSS

I placed a late dinner order for two small pies (after peak dinner hours, and this is a restaurant that rarely has more than 4 full tables at a time) and it took TWO MF HOURS to be delivered. I live 2.5 blocks away from the restaurant!!! If I wasn’t sick I would have picked up but WOW, the incompetence of this restaurant when faced with a simple Seamless delivery order is absurd. And no compensation for their lateness. We called and they said it was just being made. It’s no wonder it’s always empty in there.
Excellent Gourmet PizzA
Awesome low-key neighborhood spot. Their crust is cracker thin and crisp, the toppings are always fresh - including the basil oil drizzle - and the staff is awesome.
Best of both worlds!!
Very chill spot, ordered a pie with friends and it was better than most places in the area, they also have this homemade spicy oil... I fell In love with.

The hot combination is my favorite. I only order from here cause everything tastes fresh and so good that I can eat a large pizza in one sitting. Service is fast. I call ahead to pick up. If I cant make it then I call delivery and they come in time that my pizza is still hot and ready to eat! Only downside is that when you go during traffic time parking can be a headache

I love the atmosphere, service is relaxing, neutral, nothing too rare, but the pizza... Is incredibly. I absolutely love dine in pizza more than any type, and this is a place i would recommend over and over. On top, they sell slices!.... Muah
This is the best pizza ever. Fresh, crunchy and tasty!

I’ve ordered Nice pizza 3-4 times now and feel compelled to write a review. Why? Because it’s delicious. The crust is thin and flaky. Minimal grease and fresh tasting ingredients. My beautiful fiancé and I highly recommend La Poulaga Pizza: Tomato Sauce, Cheese, Grilled Marinated Chicken, and roasted red peppers (we added fresh basil for an extra dollar).

Been coming here for years, even after leaving the city. New staff. Same good flaky crust. The new girl(new is relative in the case), she was cute, and witty. Keeping the patrons happy lady. Keep it up
Horrible and overpriced. The pizza isn't special and it is way too small for the price. Don't waste your money here it's not worth it.
Good pizza and sandwich place
Last time ever ! Owner  with attitude no thanks . Back in time pizza was make with love ,now  is just about money.👎👎👎
Awsome! Delicious Pizza and very friendly service! :-)

We love the casual atmosphere and family friendly service of this restaurant.  The salads are good starters to share amongst two people.  The extremely thin crust pizzas are different than your typical NYC pizza, but in a good way.  With this particular style of pizza, two people can easily finish off a 16" pie; you won't get overly stuff on bread; and the cheese, sauce, and toppings take center stage.
Burnt pizza. Impossible to cut, a waste of my money
Really used to enjoy this place but it's not what it was 3-4 years ago.  Quality of food took a dip but still enjoyable enough.
Pizza tasted alright, but we should have trusted the Sanitary Inspection Grade B. The place seems to mostly deliver Pizza.
Can also have time to look at

I just wasted 20 dollars for a 16 inches pizza, the price i saw online said $14 for a large pizza, the add-on olives was $3! seriously? i gave the guy $20 and he didn't even bother to give me my change...i get it, Bedstuy is trending but this is not a neighborhood worth a $20 pizza...with a mediocre taste...The Margarita pizza did not have mozzarella cheese, they used a regular American cheese, c'mon!!! Margarita Pizza should be a Margarita pizza!...learn from the Italians!  Brado in Brooklyn Heights has better pizza options!
I ate here a few times. Didn't like their pizza.
Horrible service. Overpriced pizza.
wide selection of artisanal quality pizza
Two words: absolutely amazing!
Great Pizza !

Awesome pizza, super thin crust and full of flavor. And their delivery time is unreal.. Fastest delivery I've ever had (and I order from them a lot, so it's not a 1 time fluke). Seems like other reviewers complained about delivery times.. As if 2016, it doesn't seem to be an issue.

(Translated by Google) Excellent place your staff is very attentive. Greetings to Venezuelan corduroy Jesus Quintero thank you for your attention  (Original) Excelente lugar su personal es muy atento. Saludos al pana Venezolano Jesús Quintero gracias por tu atención

Great pizza! The Service was friendly. Restaurant has a lot of character. Love the thin crust. My wife is from Chicago, and she's not a big pizza fan. She loved it. New York 1 Chicago 0. By the way, we will be back.
The pizza tasted ok for the price. They have hot oil to add to the pizza which gives each slice a little more flavor. The green salad tasted mediocre and $8 for a glass of wine.
(Translated by Google) Great pizza, crispy and tasty  (Original) Estupenda pizza,crujiente y sabrosa
Good...

The decor is warm, the staff is friendly and polite, and the pizza was ready in no time. I know New Yorkers love a thin crust, though, but this is absurd. Expect the crust to be about the mass of a tortilla, further flattened by a steamroller until it's the diameter of a pizza and falls apart when you touch it. I strongly recommend this place if you love thin crusts, but not if you're hungry.

What happened to this place?  We used to rave about it.  Whenever friends from out of town asked to go get pizza, this was the local place we would take them.  I used to love their slices being served on a real ceramic dish with a side of small salad.  Some sporting event on the tube, empty wine bottles for water at at your table.  Really casual atmosphere.  Then we started to call for our pizza to come and pick it up.  Apparently that is a completely alien concept.  They botch it every time.  And what seems to be happening is that they just start making it when you arrive to pick it up.  Out last attempt was 45 minutes and when I urgently asked for  the pie, they pulled it out of the oven half cooked and super small,  my gf (who just got out of surgery and was famished) and I just got fed up, returned the pie and now have just moved on.  Sadly.  Adios Nice Pizza.  You are just too casual it seems.

Terrible delivery service. I asked them not to ring the doorbell since our baby was sleeping. Not only did they ring it, but they kept ringing the door bell until I opened the door. Won't order from them again. If you do, I would recommend not to pay any tip electronically in advance since you don't know what nuisances you will have to deal with.
Great if you're into waiting 2 hours for delivery.
We had a good time and the pizzas was extraordinary, thin crust and great toppings.
I liked it a lot! The thin crust pepperoni is Awesome!
Via delivery: nice Nicoise salad, nice "La Caprese Pizza". The crust was very thin crispy around the outside, like a cracker. Not so crispy under the toppings; more chewy.
Nice crispy thin crust pizza with lots of options.

My favorite pizza in the city. Not typical New York style, it's got a really thin crispy crust. High quality super fresh toppings. Great for take out or delivery, and the shop is usually pretty chill if you want to eat in. Waitstaff are always very nice, and my deliveries have always been timely. I love this place!
Super thin and crispy bases with fresh toppings. Fast delivery too!
(Translated by Google) Extraordinary!!!!!  (Original) Extraordinaire!!!!!

1. wine delivered was hot!! 2. pizza (the one I asked with ham on topping) it was not with ham!! 3. the so called homemade sangria tastes like kerosene!! 4. the pizza (personal one) the smallest one was 15$us!!!!
Great pizza slice place. Lots of variety and very well cooked (crispy crust with great melted cheese and plenty of sauce). Pricing is very reasonable.
One apple
yum!!! pepperoni pizza is a awesome!
WORSE PIZZA EVER!!!!!!
The French have only gone and beaten the Italians at their own game.. Quality pizza.
Not your regular pizza, but a nice substitute when you're feeling like something a bit different. The smoked salmon pizza was way more delicious than I expected. Lovely, hearty salads to boot.
